original_text: And other ten thousand left alive did the children of Judah carry away captive, and brought them unto the top of the rock, and cast them down from the top of the rock, that they all were broken in pieces.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 또 만 명을 사로잡아 가지고 바위 꼭대기에 올라가서 거기서 밀쳐 내려뜨려서 그들의 온 몸이 부서지게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And other ten thousand left alive
did the children of Judah carry away captive
and brought them unto the top of the rock
and cast them down from the top of the rock
that they all were broken in pieces
